Name: Tale Of Starship
About the game: Tale of Starship is a classic shoot them up, the objective of this game is to survive. Tale of Starship use RNG to generate enemy's wave. Moreover as the game progress, you can upgrade your starship through different ameliorations, each pool of ameliorations is generate randomly. Tale of Starship offers 2 games mode. A mode 'Tale' where you try to survive at different enemy waves and fight some intermediate boss, to upgrade your starship to eliminate the guardian of each zone. And a mode 'Survivor' where you have to armed your starship at the beginning, and survive as long as you can at different ennemy waves with the starship you have make. This game have: More 100 hours of gameplay 2 Games mode 1 Survivor mode with 3 difficulties 6 Starships, playable and unlockable Playable with the mouse and the gamepad More 30 different ameliorations An original soundtrack More 150 different enemies 4 different worlds A game in 60 FPS A game proposing heavy roguelike elements Tale of Starship is a game developped in its wholeness by Mathieu GUERARD, whether it is the music, the graphisms, the programmation, etc...
